Ella

Korean: 엘라

Country:

South Korea

Group (2014-2015):
4G

Introduction

Ella is a South Korean singer. She was a member of the girl group 4G. She debuted solo with "Who Do You Think You Are" on July 18, 2013.

Jul 18, 2013
